column4: Can I get hoary users to try out the latest release of my menu editor? I need lots of testers. http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=21390
i'll get it now to try it tee hee
Are you the one I told to wait a day? :)
I'm going to, if I can get some speedy QA from you guys. :)
the editor is just perfect at the moment does what it needs to do
i'll make a docbook for it later so i it could have a simple manual at least
I don't really think it needs one.
how can you delete entries in the editor say i want to delete vlc or move it elsewhere
err, double click on the entry and click the delete button
You can write one, I can't guarantee I'll use it.
I know I'll need one later on though.
